correctness.evidence: Uses tasks template with <input>/<output>/<constraints>/<workflow>; checks only in last stage; stage IDs follow 'n: snake_case'; tools declared via <tools><tool name="..."/></tools>.

clarity.evidence: Concise actions per stage (≤3); deliverables defined; schema and example explicit.

cognitive_load.evidence: Four stages; minimal branching; clear sequencing with compact bullets.

reasoning_guidance.evidence: Early <questions> guide analysis; final <checks> ensure verifiable acceptance.

alignment.evidence: Conforms to GUIDE tag, naming, enum rules; language policy respected (English content).

completeness.evidence: All required sections present; strict JSON Schema plus sample; per-stage deliverables specified.

constraint_design.evidence: Constraints are measurable and actionable (indentation, ≤14 words, kebab-case, schema validity).

user_experience.evidence: Scannable structure; clear file paths and acceptance signals; minimal friction.

recommendations: LOW: Add an optional <example> showing end-to-end minimal output.
LOW: Consider clarifying tool selection criteria when multiple tools are listed.
advisory_suggestions: Optionally include <guardrails> if scope expands to safety-critical tasks.
strengths: Strict, machine-validated output schema with sample.
Well-formed workflow with checks in the last stage.
Clear, measurable constraints and concise steps.
summary: Template-grade tasks prompt with excellent structure and validation. Minor optional enhancements could further aid adoption.
